h3cDhcpRelay.name: h3cDhcpRelay

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB module.

h3cDhcpRelay.contactinfo: Platform Team Huawei 3Com Technologies Co.,Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip: 100085

h3cDHCPRIfSelectTable.name: h3cDHCPRIfSelectTable
h3cDHCPRIfSelectTable.description: A table for configuring relay mode for interfaces.

h3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry.name: h3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry
h3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry.description: An entry for configuring relay mode for an interface.

h3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode.name: h3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode
h3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode.description: If the value is on, the DHCP relay function would be enabled on this interface.

h3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable.name: h3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable
h3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable.description: A table for configuring ip addresses for DHCP server groups.

h3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry.name: h3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry
h3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry.description: An entry for configuring ip addresses for a DHCP server group.

h3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId.name: h3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId
h3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId.description: Group identifier of DHCP server group.

h3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType.name: h3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType
h3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType.description: Ip address type of DHCP server.

h3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus.name: h3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus
h3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy.

h3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable.name: h3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable
h3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable.description: A table for configuring DHCP server groups for interfaces.

h3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry.name: h3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry
h3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry.description: An entry for configuring DHCP server group for an interface.

h3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId.name: h3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId
h3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId.description: The DHCP server group for this interface.

h3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus.name: h3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus
h3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy

h3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable.name: h3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable
h3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable.description: A table containing the states of dhcp security address check switchs for interfaces.

h3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry.name: h3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry
h3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry.description: An entry containing the state of dhcp security address check switch for an interface.

h3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch.name: h3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch
h3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch.description: The state of dhcp security address check switch for this interface. It has two defined values: enabled and disabled. If the value is enabled, the address check function would be enabled. The default value is disabled.

h3cDHCPRSecurityTable.name: h3cDHCPRSecurityTable
h3cDHCPRSecurityTable.description: A table containing the information of DHCP security.

h3cDHCPRSecurityEntry.name: h3cDHCPRSecurityEntry
h3cDHCPRSecurityEntry.description: An entry containing the information of DHCP security.

h3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType.name: h3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType
h3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType.description: DHCP client's net ip address type

h3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus.name: h3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus
h3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy

h3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum
h3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum.description: The total number of the packets received from DHCP clients by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum
h3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum.description: The total number of the brodcast packets transmitted to DHCP clients by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum
h3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum.description: The total number of the packets received from DHCP Servers by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum
h3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum.description: The total number of the packets transmitted to DHCP Servers by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum
h3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Discover packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRRequestPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRRequestPktNum
h3cDHCPRRequestPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Request packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum.name: h3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum
h3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Decline packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRReleasePktNum.name: h3cDHCPRReleasePktNum
h3cDHCPRReleasePktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Release packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRInformPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRInformPktNum
h3cDHCPRInformPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Inform packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPROfferPktNum.name: h3cDHCPROfferPktNum
h3cDHCPROfferPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Offer packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRAckPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRAckPktNum
h3cDHCPRAckPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Ack packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRNakPktNum.name: h3cDHCPRNakPktNum
h3cDHCPRNakPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Nak packets handled by DHCP relay.

h3cDHCPRStatisticsReset.name: h3cDHCPRStatisticsReset
h3cDHCPRStatisticsReset.description: This node only supports set operation. If the value is true,it will clear all of the packet statistics.

h3cDHCPRCycleStatus.name: h3cDHCPRCycleStatus
h3cDHCPRCycleStatus.description: If the value is on, the cycle function would be enabled.

h3cDHCPROption82Switch.name: h3cDHCPROption82Switch
h3cDHCPROption82Switch.description: If the value is enabled, DHCP relay supporting option 82 function would be enabled.

h3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy.name: h3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy
h3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy.description: The strategies of DHCP relay handling option 82. 'drop' indicates DHCP relay discarding the request packet including option 82. 'keep' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet without any change of the option 82. 'replace' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet on condition that it generates a new option 82 to replace the original one.

h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable.name: h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable
h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable.description: A table containing the information of DHCP option 82. This table depends on h3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable. An entry of this table will be created when an entry of h3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable is created.

h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry.name: h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry
h3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry.description: An entry containing the information of DHCP option 82.

h3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch.name: h3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch
h3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch.description: If DHCP relay supports option 82 functions, the value is 'enabled'. If DHCP relay does not support option 82 functions, the value is 'disabled'.

h3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy.name: h3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy
h3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy.description: The strategies of DHCP relay handling option 82. 'drop' indicates DHCP relay discarding the request packet including option 82. 'keep' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet without any change of the option 82. 'replace' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet on condition that it generates a new option 82 to replace the original one.

h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat.name: h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat
h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat.description: The format of DHCP relay option 82. 'normal' is the standard format. 'verbose' is the detailed format.

h3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType.name: h3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType
h3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType.description: Property of DHCP relay option 82 verbose format. The value can be set by user only when the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is set with 'verbose'. If the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is 'normal', the value is automatically set with 'invalid'. the value can not be set with 'invalid' by user. 'mac' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the mac of DHCP relay input interface. If the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is set with 'verbose', the value is automatically set with 'mac'. 'sysname' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the name of the DHCP relay. 'userdefine' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the string defined by user. If the value is set with 'userdefine', the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString must be set simultaneously.

h3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString.name: h3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString
h3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString.description: The string defined by user to fill in the option 82 verbose format. If the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is 'normal', or the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType is 'mac' or 'sysname', it is set with a null string automatically and can not be modified by user. It must be set with a non-zero length string when the value of h3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType is set with 'userdefine'.
